readable.title: 3427233064_6af01bfc5c
readable.content: A girl in pink polka dots looks at a horse . A girl is hanging on the fence watching a horse . A little girl stands on the fence while peeking through it to look at the horse . A young girl clings to a fence ant watches the horse on the other side . A young girl dressed all in pink is standing on a fence and looking at a horse .
